data.name: Powder
data.detailed_description:
Just play. It’s automatic.


Press play on your favorite game and let the AI do the rest - your best highlights will be detected automatically, ready for download at the end of each gaming session.

Keep full control of your highlights.


Powder PC also allows manual clipping and full session recording for gamers who want full control over their game clips. Use a hotkey to clip the last 30 seconds of your gameplay and save it directly to your Powder library. Record your entire gaming session if you want to include everything in your video.

Get clips instantly on mobile.


Create an account on the Powder mobile app and connect it to Powder PC to get all your clips sent directly to mobile. You can edit your PC clips instantly on Powder’s brand new mobile editor.

Share everywhere.


On Powder PC you’re one click away from showing off your best game clips to the rest of the world. Share to Youtube, Discord and more.

Your favorite games are on Powder.


Warzone, Minecraft, Valorant, Overwatch & many more! Powder’s AI detection tech is compatible with the hottest games. Don’t see your most played game? Don’t worry, more games are constantly being added to Powder’s AI.

data.short_description: Powder PC is an AI gaming recorder that automatically detects and saves the best moments from your gameplay. Just leave Powder running in the background while you play, and your best highlights will be clipped and saved to the Powder library. Pair with Powder mobile to get highlights on your phone.

  • OS: Windows 10
